content.rendered:
JOIN

CHAIIWALA

Become a part of one of the fastest growing fast casual dining concepts in the UK

  • Why Chaiiwala
  • SUCCESS STORIES
  • APPROVAL PROCESS
  • AVAILABLE MARKETS
  • FAQ
  • APPLY NOW

why join the chaiiwala network

Quite simply, because there has never been a better time to join and grow with Chaiiwala. We offer a great opportunity to join a company that is literally on the lips of all in the industry. Our phenomenal growth has been driven by a strong commitment to support all our franchise partners every step of the way. 

From marketing and investing in the brand to having the right commercial partners there are lots of reasons to choose Chaiiwala.

fast growing brand

From one to 80 stores in five years shows the popularity of the brand with the consumers

owner operated or entrepreneurs

Our ideal partners are those who have a proven track record of operating their own businesses

full support

From one to 80 stores in five years shows the popularity of the brand with the consumers

chaiiwala

Become a part of one of the fastest growing, most talked about brands around.

Now is an exciting time to become a franchisee as we are constantly on the hunt for talented individuals looking for the opportunity to run your their own business.

Strong restaurant sales growth versus competitors.
Over 50 stores across the UK with significant potential for growth.
We are on the way to become a global brand with franchise opportunities around the world.

awards and accolades

“‘Indian Starbucks’ is coming to Bolton.”

  • . . . . . . The Bolton News

BEST TAKEAWAY

  • . . . . . . FINALISTS 2017 Leicester Curry Awards 2017

“In a nutshell: the best desi chai is finally coming to London!”

  • . . . . . . Metro

“The most distinctive tea on the drink menu is the Karak Chaii – ‘a strong tea also known masala chai’ – a blend of black tea, milk, sugar and spices boiled in a pan on a low flame.”

  • . . . . . . Birmingham Mail

QUALIFICATION CRITERIA

PASSION

  • We are looking for passionate people who understand the brand and willing to take that extra step and run their own business

EXPERIENCE

  • In an ideal world we would like franchise partners with experience in the food industry however those who are running their own businesses would also align with our needs

FINANCIAL RESOURCES

  • Minimum of £500,000 in liquid assets

Straight forward application process.

APPROVAL PROCESS

1

Apply Online

Fill out our online form with as much details as possible

2

Discovery Call

If successful, one of our franchise team will contact you for an informal chat

3

Review

Your application will be reviewed by the management team including background checks

4

Head Office Meeting

One-on-one meeting with our directors at our head office

5

Contract Sign

If fully approved. contracts are exchanged and you are on your way to becoming a Chaiiwala

OUR AVAILABLE MARKETS

We are currently looking to develop our network throughout the world starting with international opportunities in the Middle East, United States, Canada and Europe.

over 80

stores worldwide

MORE QUESTIONS?

How do I apply?
Simply click Apply Now on the bottom of this page and submit your application form.
What are the next steps after I submit my application?
Your application will be reviewed and if successful a member of the team will be in touch
How much will it cost on average to open a Chaiiwala?
There is no fixed costs as costs vary based on multiple factors such as the location, configuration, and size of store.
Can you guarantee a location?
Unfortunately, due to the nature of our franchise network we cannot guarantee any locations
I have my own property, can this be used for a Chaiiwala?
If the size and property is suitable after assessment by our Estates team then we are open to its use as a Chaiiwala store.
What experience do I need?
Ideally, we would prefer our franchise partners to have previous food experience, however, this is not essential. We would prefer those with experience in running a business as we will provide full training
What is your franchise fee and ongoing fixed costs?
These fees will be discussed for successful candidates who have been identified by our Franchise team.

If you share our vision as well as our passion, we’ll support your ambition and business objectives. With a programme tailor-made to answer your every need. From store location, design and fitting to staff training and sales plans.

APPLY NOW

Apply Online
